title: Cannot add eSIM on Pixel 4 XL
content: I am unable to add eSIM to my Pixel 4 XL. There is not + sign next to "Mobile network" in Network and Internet". I bought unlocked UK SKU phone with 2 IMEIs and an EDIM ID shown on the label on the box. Yet only one IMEI shows in "About phone" and when setting up the phone I do not get the option to set it up with an eSIM - only with a physical SIM.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
